Title: The Trial of Robert Kelly
Plot: When the trial of R&B star R. Kelly comes to town and Tom Dubois is the ADA, Huey and Riley are on opposing sides of the hot-button "underage peeing" issue. Meanwhile, Granddad and Uncle Ruckus argue about white people during a game of checkers.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Adam West (R. Kelly\'s Lawyer),   Kevin Michael Richardson (Various),   Jim Meskimen (Reporter),   Crystal Scales (Underaged Girl),   Cree Summer (Various)
